text.全ては『今』――この瞬間の\r\n輝きのために。私と貴方が重ねた\r\n覚悟を、:
All for the sake of "now" - the 
brilliance of this moment. Let's 
engrave the determination that you 
and I have put into this trail.
text.練習の後、寄り道いたしませんか？\r\n友人と昨日カフェで過ごした…\r\nあの:
Would you like to stop by after 
practice? I was at a cafe yesterday 
with a friend… I wish we could share 
that moment together.
text.貴方の肩はとても温かくて…。\r\nその止まり木があれば、\r\n私はどこまでも: Your shoulders are so warm. With \nthat perch, I feel like I can fly \nanywhere.
text.あ、指に墨が…。ふふ、実は\r\nヤエノさんたちと書初めをしまして\r\n…洗う:
Oh, I have ink on my fingers… fufu, 
Actually, Yaeno and I had the first 
calligraphy session together… I'm a 
little sad to wash it off.
text.トレーナーさん、その…\r\n付き合っていただけませんか？\r\n…友チョコを渡: Trainer, um… would you mind going \nout with me? …For practice, handing \nfriendship chocolates….
text.貴方には、ばあや直伝の手作り\r\n菓子を用意してあるのです。温かい\r\nあの:
I have prepared for you some 
homemade sweets that are my 
grandmother's specialties. I wanted 
you to know that warm taste.
text.1年の中の、たった1日。\r\n織姫と彦星の、刹那の逢瀬。強い\r\n想いは一瞬:
Only one day in a year. A momentary 
meeting between Orihime and 
Hikoboshi. Strong feelings can 
brilliance even for a moment.
text.本物のお化けにもお菓子を配れない\r\nでしょうか？彼らの情念、意志…\r\nぜ:
Can't we give out candy to real 
ghosts too? Their passion, their will… 
I would love to hear what they have 
to say.
text.今夜は寮のサンタさんが部屋へ\r\nいらっしゃるそうです。もてなしの\r\n紅茶: Santa Claus from the dormitory is \ncoming to our room tonight. What \nkind of tea should we prepare?
text.ツリーを一緒に見に行きませんか？\r\nガラスの星が天高くきらきらと\r\n輝い:
Why don't you come and see the tree 
with me? The glass star will shine 
brightly in the sky, it must be really 
beautiful.
text.年賀状、みなさん毎年力作揃いで\r\n楽しみなのです。私も1年の感謝を\r\n込:
I look forward to seeing everyone's 
New Year's greeting cards every year. 
I also have to express my gratitude 
for the year… one by one, carefully.
text.お誕生日、おめでとうございます。\r\n睡眠は健康のもと…。おすすめの枕\r\n:
Happy Birthday and best wishes to 
you and your family. Sleep is the 
basis of health… I will give you Pillow 
recommendation later.
text.さあ、メジロ家に向かいましょう。\r\n貴方の誕生日パーティーの準備、\r\n張: Let's head over to the Mejiro house. \nWe've put a lot of effort into \npreparing for your birthday party♪
text.朝からチヨノオーさんがソワソワと\r\nしていて…ふふ♪これもまた\r\n誕生日: Chiyono o has been so restless since \nthis morning… Hehe ♪… this is one \nof the joys of birthdays, isn't it?
text.今日は寄り道をいたしませんか？\r\nせっかくの誕生日ですから、貴方に\r\nエ: Would you like to take a detour \ntoday? Since it's my birthday, I'd like \nto ask you to escort me♪
text.あら、お知らせがあるみたいです。\r\n火急の知らせかもしれませんし、\r\n1: Oh, I think there is an announcement. \nIt may be urgent news, so why don't \nyou take a look at it?
text.プレゼントが届いていますね。\r\nふふ…なにが入っているのかと\r\n考える時: You have received a present. Fufu… \nIt's also nice to spend some time \nthinking about what's inside.
text.ミッション達成おめでとう\r\nございます。この小さな積み重ねが\r\n大きな成:
Congratulations on accomplishing 
the mission. This small accumulation 
will be the foundation for a great 
achievement.
text.もうすぐイベントが始まるよう\r\nですね。準備などのお手伝いを\r\nできたら: I see that the event will be starting \nsoon. I wish I could help with \npreparations.
text.イベント、覗いてみませんか？\r\n期間限定…つまり今しか楽しめない\r\nだな:
Would you like to take a peek at the 
event? Limited time… In other words, 
something you can only enjoy now, 
so we can't miss it♪
text.軽やかで肌触りのよい服が好きです\r\n歩く度にふわりと揺れるのを\r\n感じる:
I like light clothing that feels nice to the touch. 
Feeling it dance and flutter around as I walk… 
makes my heart feel lighter too.
text.お世話になっている仕立て屋さんは\r\nいつも私好みのいい生地を持って\r\nき:
I owe my tailor greatly for always carrying 
fabrics to my tastes… indeed, this very outfit 
is made with them.
text.先日パーマーに誘われてクレープを\r\n頂いたのですが…ふふっ、2人して\r\n:
The other day Palmer invited me out to get 
crêpes and… heheh, we both ended up with 
cream on our noses.
text.…少し、ふらつきますが…\r\n問題ありません。こういったことは\r\n慣れてい: …a little unstable, but… no problem. \nI'm used to this kind of thing.
text.弱気になってはいけない…。\r\n耐え忍ばなければ。: I must not be weak… I have to endure.
text.なぜかしら、今ならどこまでも\r\n走れそう。…いえ、走ってみたい。\r\n限界: I don't know why, but I feel like I can \nrun anywhere now. …No, I want to \nrun. Beyond the limit…!
text.一分、一秒、一瞬…細かく意識して\r\n集中できているのを感じます。\r\nこれ:
Every minute, every second, every 
moment… I feel that I am able to 
focus on the details. If this is the 
case, I'm sure…
text.1、2、3…ふぅ。\r\n体温、心拍、筋肉ともに良好です。\r\nさあ今日はなに: One, two, three… phew. \nTemperature, heart rate, and muscles \nare all good. What shall we do today?
text.脚の調子はすこぶる良好です。\r\n全力でトレーニングができる…。\r\nそれだ: Legs are in great shape. I can train \nas hard as I can… That alone is \nunbearably exhilarating.
text.『いつも通り』の1日は、\r\n私にとって最良でしたが…『今』は\r\nより上を: "As usual" day, was the best I could \ndo… but now I have to aim higher.
text.一瞬一瞬を大切に…\r\n丁寧なトレーニングを\r\n心がけて参りましょう。: Let's cherish every moment… \nLet's keep in mind to train carefully.
text.足取りが重い…ですが、この程度で\r\n挫けるわけにはいきません。\r\n積み重:
My steps are heavy… but I can't 
afford to give up at this level. 
Believe in the training you have been 
accumulating…
text.ふぅ…こういう日もありますね。\r\nまずは焦らず…お茶を1杯、\r\nリラック:
Well… there are days like this, aren't 
there? First of all, take your time… 
why don't you have a cup of tea and 
relax?
text.トレーナーさん…今日は総合的に\r\n考えて…トレーニングメニューの\r\n修正:
Trainer-san… today I think we need 
to take a comprehensive look… 
I wonder if it's necessary to revise 
the training menu…
text.今の私で、生きた軌跡を残せるの\r\nかしら。…否、焦りこそ禁物。\r\n深呼吸:
I wonder if I will be able to leave a 
living trace of my life as I am now. No, 
I must not rush. Take a deep breath… 
calm down, take a deep breath…
text.急いては事を仕損じる。\r\n…無茶をすべきは、本当に\r\n今この時なのでしょ: Haste makes waste. …Is this really \nthe time to be reckless?
text.覚悟と無謀は違うものです。\r\nこれ以上無理をして、一体\r\nなにを得られる:
There is a difference between 
preparedness and recklessness. 
What will we gain by pushing 
ourselves any further?
text.ただ前へ、前へ。\r\n私の全てはそのために。: Just moving forward, forward. \nEverything I do is for that.
text.どうぞ、ご清覧ください。\r\n私の最高の走り、最上の輝きを…。: Please take a look. \nMy best run, my best brilliance…
text.彼を知り己を知れば百戦殆からず。\r\n己も、相手も見つめ直して…いざ。:
If you know your enemy and know 
yourself, you will never be defeated 
in a hundred battles. You must 
reexamine yourselves and your 
opponent… now.
text.長き研鑽、長き修練。\r\nその全ては、この刹那のため。: Long study, long training. \nAll of them are for this moment.
text.この高揚…過去の偉人たちも似た\r\n気持ちだったのでしょうか。: This exhilaration… I wonder if the \ngreats of the past felt the same way.
text.なにも心配いりません。\r\nどうかウイナーズ・サークルで\r\n私の帰りを待っ: Nothing to worry about. \nPlease wait for my return at the \nwinner's circle.
text.後はいつも通り、力を尽くすのみ。\r\n今の私を、お見せいたします。: All that remains is to do my best as \nusual. I will show you who I am now.
text.マイナス要素がない…。\r\nふふっ、私にとっては\r\nそれだけで十分過ぎるほ: No negative factors… Phew, that's \nalone more than enough for me.
text.丁寧に、1つずつ。\r\nこれまでの努力の成果を信じて。\r\n…行って参ります: Carefully, one at a time. \nBelieve in the fruits of our past \nefforts. …I will go.
text.集中…集中…。\r\n大丈夫、この程度の不調…\r\n何度も切り抜けてきたもの。: Focus… focus… It's okay, this level \nof discomfort… is something I've \nbeen through many times.
text.万全の時はない。それがレース。\r\n乗り越えましょう…共にこの壁を。: There is no perfect time. That's racing. Let's overcome this wall… together.
text.逆境の時こそ、その者の本質が\r\n現れるならば…『今』こそこの覚悟\r\n見せ: If it is in times of adversity that a \nperson's true nature is revealed, then \n[now] is the time to show this resolve.
text.…弱音は吐きません。\r\n今、この状態でもできることを\r\n丁寧に、1つずつ: I will not whine. I will do what I can \ndo now, carefully, one thing at a \ntime…
text.勇猛に、果敢に。\r\nこの逆境、\r\n跳ね除けてみせましょう。: Be brave, be daring. \nWe will overcome this adversity.
text.こんなところでは、終われない。\r\n生きた証を残すために…\r\n絶対に、終わ: This is not the place to end it. In \norder to leave proof of our life… \nwe can't let this end…!
text.あと一歩、この先に…目指す輝きが！: One more step, just ahead… \nthe brilliance we're aiming for!
text.次こそは、これ以上の結果を…！: Next time, we'll do better than this…!
text.善戦と言われる結果ですが、満足など…。: The result is called a good fight, \nbut I am not satisfied…
text.…また1から鍛え直さなければ。: …I have to train again from scratch.
text.みなさまへ感謝の意を、歌に込めて。: We express our gratitude to all of \nyou in our songs.
text.ステージでの輝き、お見せします。: I will show you, My brilliance on \nthe stage.
text.貴方は私の中に輝きを見出して\r\nくださいました。あの時の出会いが\r\n今で: You have found a radiance in me. \nI am now very proud of that \nencounter.
text.おはようございます。モーニング\r\nメニューの紅茶に蜂蜜を垂らせば…\r\n心: Good morning. If you add honey to \nthe morning tea, it's a pleasant way \nto start the day.
text.あら、まだ少し眠たげなご様子。\r\nご入用でしたら…目覚めのアロマを\r\nひ: Oh, you still look a little sleepy. \nIf you need it, may I offer you a spritz \nof awakening aroma?
text.お昼休み、保健室の先生とお茶を\r\nしました。常連ですので…感謝の\r\n気持:
During lunch break, I had tea with the 
infirmary doctor. Since I'm a regular 
visitor, I have to express my gratitude 
on a regular basis.
text.友との団らん、湯気立つ料理…\r\nお昼のカフェテリアは、何度足を\r\n運んで:
Huddling with friends, steamy food… 
the cafeteria at lunchtime is always 
an exciting place to be, no matter 
how many times you visit.
text.トレーナーさん、無理は…めっ！\r\n…いかがでしょう？クリークさん\r\n直伝:
Trainer, pushing yourself… is 
no-no ! How about this? This is a 
countermeasure to prevent staying 
up late at night directly from 
Creek-san.
text.こんな静かな夜は、散歩がしたく\r\nなりますね。日がない分、少し羽を\r\n伸:
On a quiet night like this, I feel like 
going for a walk. Since there is no 
sun, I think I can stretch my wings a 
little more… Would you like to join 
me?
text.新入生さんの横顔は、どれも夢を\r\n目指し輝いていますね。…ふふっ。\r\nつ: The profiles of the new students are \nall shining with dreams. Fufu… I can't \nhelp but squint.
text.先ほど、向日葵の花束を抱えた\r\nパーマーと会ったのですが…\r\nその笑顔、: I just met a Palmer with a bouquet of \nsunflowers… her smile was just like a \nsunflower♪
text.夜更かしはいけない、とは思うの\r\nですが…つい季節のせいにして\r\nページ: I know I shouldn't stay up late, but… \nI just want to blame it on the season \nand flip through the pages.
text.朝食のポタージュで、ばあやの\r\n手作りの味を思い出しました。\r\n寒い日の: Potage for breakfast reminded me of \nthe taste of my grandma's homemade \nwarm soup… on a cold day…
text.先日、姉様の小さい頃の写真を\r\n見つけました。幼いのに凜として\r\n美しく:
The other day, I found a picture of 
my sister when she was a little girl. 
She looked dignified, beautiful and 
dazzling despite her young age.
text.ご存じですか？タマモさんの値切り\r\n交渉術…垣間見える義理人情。\r\nまる:
Did you know? Tamamo-san's 
bargaining and negotiation skills… 
the glimpse of righteousness person. 
It was like watching rakugo.
text.ガラスの割れる音…\r\nなぜあれほど独特なのでしょう。\r\n甲高いあの音…ど: The sound of breaking glass… why is \nit so peculiar? That high-pitched \nsound… I just can't get used to it.
text.ヘリオスさんから先ほど…『新しー\r\nタピ店開店ウェイ★』との朗報が。\r\n:
I just heard some happy news from 
Helios. She said "A new boba store 
opened weiii★". Fufu, my detour 
routes are increasing ♪
text.実は、メジロの主治医へ贈るお礼の\r\n品に迷っていて…ここはやはり\r\n仕事:
Actually, I'm not sure what to give as 
a thank-you gift to the Mejiro doctor 
… should I get a work tool… Maybe 
a needle?
text.おへその出る服は新鮮ですね。\r\n華やかな衣装に、激しいダンス…\r\nふふっ:
The belly button revealing clothes 
are fresh. Gorgeous costumes and 
intense dancing… Hehe, even my 
heart is dancing.
text.病室で夢見たあの衣装を、今…\r\nこうして身に纏っている。\r\n…あの日の私:
That costume I dreamed of in my 
hospital room, now… I am wearing it 
like this. …I wish I could show it to 
the me of that day.
text.胸のブローチは、お父様から\r\n贈られたネックレスがモチーフで…\r\n手を当:
The brooch on my chest is based on 
a necklace my father gave me… 
When I put my hand on it, 
I feel at peace.
text.優雅で…体への負担も計算された…\r\nまさに至上の勝負服。勝利によって\r\n:
Elegant… the burden on the body 
was also calculated… the very best 
of race outfit. I must show my 
gratitude by winning.
text.チヨノオーさんを揺り起こす、\r\n毎朝の何気ない日常…これもまた、\r\n私に: Every morning, when I shake Chiyono \nto wake her up, it is another happy \nmoment for me.
text.オグリさんの食べっぷりには、\r\nいつも惚れ惚れしますね。\r\nおかげで私も: I am always amazed at the way \nOguri-san eat. Thanks to her, I too, \neat more and more.
text.夜のお茶会をタキオンさんとご一緒\r\nしたのですが、紅茶が光っていて…\r\n:
I had an evening tea party with 
Tachyon-san, and the tea was 
glowing… Fuf, what an amazing 
experience♪
text.ヤエザクラは美しいですね、\r\nと言ったら…ふふっ、学友2人の\r\n頬が桜色: When I told them that the yaezakura \ntrees are beautiful…… Fufu, my two \nschoolmates' cheeks turned pink.
text.よろしければ、次の休日…メジロの\r\n避暑地に行きませんか？あそこの\r\n湖:
If you like, why don't we go on our 
next holiday to the summer resort 
of Mejiro? There is nothing like 
reading a book by the lake there.
text.紅葉の季節は短くとも、\r\nその一瞬を燃えるように謳歌する。\r\n…惚れ惚れ:
Even though the autumn leaves is 
short, we celebrate the moment with 
a burning sensation. …It is a beauty 
that makes you fall in love with it.
text.ふふ。冬が来る度、思い出します。\r\n重ね着に重ね着を勧められ…\r\nメジロ:
Fufu. Every time winter comes, 
I remember. I was encouraged to put 
on layer upon layer of clothing… and 
they called me a Mejiro snowman♪
text.ガラスと呼ばれたこの脚ですが、\r\nそう簡単には砕けません。\r\nこの覚悟、: These legs called [glass] will not \nshatter so easily. Please accept this \nresolve.
text.ストレッチはじっくりと、入念に。\r\nこの積み重ねも私の武器ですので。: Stretching is slow and careful. \nThis accumulation is also my weapon.
text.己の脚で、大地を踏み。\r\n己の脚で、駆ける。\r\nそれだけでこの胸は高鳴る:
With my feet, I tread the earth. 
With my legs, I run. 
That alone is enough to make my 
heart beat.
text.今、この瞬間を大切に。\r\n1秒1秒集中して、今日という日を\r\n最高のもの: Cherish this moment. Concentrate on \nevery second and make this day the \nbest it can be.
text.効率のよいトレーニングに\r\n最適な環境ですね。この夏、\r\n太陽よりも熱く: It's the perfect environment for \nefficient training. This summer, let's \nshine hotter than the sun.
text.日々、負担を考慮したメニューを\r\n組んでくださることに感謝を。\r\n結果で: Thank you for your daily menus that \ntake into account my workloads. \nI will respond with results. I promise.
text.己の中の『輝き』が少し見えて\r\n参りました。この輝きがきっと、\r\n私たち: I am beginning to see a little of the \n[brilliance] within me. This radiance \nwill surely illuminate our present.
text.2人で共に歩む道のりが、今では\r\n私の誇りです。この一瞬一瞬を\r\n重ねた: The road we walked together is now my pride. What lies ahead of us from \nmoment by moment, surely is…
text.1番大切なこの輝き、貴方に捧げます。: I dedicate this most precious \nbrilliance to you.
text.ガラスの脚が、幸せを運んでくれました。: The glass legs brought us happiness.
text.退けません、まだまだ、前へ。: We will not retreat. \nWe are still moving forward.
text.この瞬間の輝きが…更に強く…！: The brilliance of this moment… \neven stronger…!
text.散りゆく定めでも――: Even if it's destined to shatter—
text.みなさまに感謝いたします。: My thanks to all of you.
text.ガラスの翼、輝かせて！: Wings of glass, let them shine!
text.儚きガラスの身よ、高く、大空へ。\r\nその身は、誰よりも輝くから！: Ephemeral body of glass, soar high \ninto the sky. For your body shines \nbrighter than anyone else!
text.私の生きた証、ここに1つ刻みます。: I engrave one proof of my life here.
text.ガラスの輝きが、私の道を照らしてくれました。: The brilliance of the glass illuminated \nmy path.
text.明日はこちら。楽しみですね。: Tomorrow is here. I'm looking \nforward to it.
text.どのような修練を\r\nいたしましょうか。: What kind of training should we do?
text.共に歴史を見つめ直しましょう。: Let's look back at history together.
text.ウマ娘名鑑のレベルが\r\n上がったようですね。: It seems that the level of Uma \nMusume Directory has increased.
text.ご一緒にいかがですか？: Would you like to join us?
text.最高の今を、共に…。: The best of the moment, together…
text.いっそうお役に立てるかと。: I hope I can be of further assistance.
text.私にこんな力があったなんて…。: I never knew I had such power…
text.頑張りに感謝いたします。: Thank you for your hard work.
text.学園の歴史を感じ…\r\n身が引き締まります。: I feel the history of the school… \nit makes me tense.
text.身なりを正し、\r\n背筋を伸ばして参りましょう。: Let's straighten up our appearance \nand stand up straight.
text.脚が動かしやすい…\r\n最高のダンスができそうです。: I can move my legs easily… \nI think I can dance the best.
text.夢に見た衣装…華麗な輝き、\r\n際立たせてみせます。: The costume I dreamed of… I'll make \nit stand out in all its splendor.
text.黒と白のコントラスト。\r\n輝きが、より際立つようにと…。: The contrast between black and \nwhite. To make the brilliance stand \nout even more…
text.この衣装なら、より強く輝けそうです。: This costume will make me \nshine brighter.
text.おはようございます。本日も\r\n変わらず走り続けられることを\r\nとても嬉し:
Good morning. I'm happy and grateful to be 
able to enjoy another day of running.
text.屋敷のマッサージ師に、\r\n目を覚ますツボを教わりまして。\r\n試しにつん、:
Our estate's massage therapist taught me 
pressure points for waking up. ...Would you 
like me to test them out on you?
text.たまに、おやつに金平糖を\r\n購入します。透き通った見た目と、\r\n口の中で: At times I buy konpeitō candies as a snack. I really appreciate their crystalline appearance and fleeting mouthfeel.
text.こうしてみなさんと1つのことに\r\n挑戦する経験は少なかったので…\r\n大変:
I have not had a lot of experience 
working with people like this on a 
single challenge, so… it's a lot of 
work, but it's a lot of fun.
text.チヨノオーさんから儀式での私の\r\n写真を送ってもらったのですが…\r\nふふ: Chiyono O. sent me a picture of me \nat the ceremony… Hehe, it's a little \nembarrassing.
text.イベントミッションは\r\nこちらになります。1日1日を\r\n大切に励んでいき: The event mission is here, so let's \nmake the most of each and every day.
text.受け取り忘れはありませんか？\r\nなにひとつ取りこぼすことなく、\r\nこの先: Have you forgotten anything? \nLet's make sure we don't miss \nanything and connect it to the future.
